name: PopoverParams
doc:
@platform android 0.8 @platform blackberry 3.1.2 @platform iphone 0.8 @platform ipad 0.8 @platform mobileweb 1.8 @pseudo @editurl https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/edit/master/apidoc/Titanium/UI/iPad/Popover.yml

Dictionary of options for Titanium.UI.iPad.Popover.show and Titanium.UI.iPad.Popover.hide.

@description

All properties are optional except you need to specify the view property for the show() method to attach the popover to a view component.

The hide() method only supports the animated property.

property.name: animated
property.doc: Indicates whether to animate showing or hiding the popover.
property.shortDoc: Indicates whether to animate showing or hiding the popover. ...

property.name: rect
property.doc:
Sets the arrow position of the popover relative to the attached view object's dimensions when showing the popover.

@description

Setting the x, y coordinates to (0, 0) places the popover in the top-left corner of the view object. Set both the width and height properties to 1.
property.default: All dimension properties are set to zero.
property.shortDoc:
Sets the arrow position of the popover relative to the attached view object's dimensions
when showing the popover. ...

property.name: view
property.doc: Attaches the popover to the specified view when showing the popover.
